title: Formwork Box
description:
Design as a means of simplifying people’s lives, the Formwork Collection (2013) is a modular stacking system that brings order to the things that populate our desks. The shapes and sizes of the components were carefully considered so that each contributes to the utility of the whole. The result is a sleek system that brings rhythm and order to everyday tasks. Made in China.
  • Removable cup and lid.
  • Multi-use.
  • Nonslip silicone base.
Brand
Herman Miller
Collection
Formwork Collection
General Dimensions
  • 3⅝" H 9½" W 6⅜" D
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Formwork Tray
description:
Working from their studio in London, American designer Kim Colin and British designer Sam Hecht have been honored with more than 50 international awards. Accolades, however, are not why they are in this business. Their Formwork Tray (2013) is one of the carefully considered desk accessories that make up the Formwork Collection. The shapes and sizes of the components were carefully considered so that each contributes to the utility of the whole. Made in China.
  • Part of a sleek system that brings rhythm and order to everyday tasks.
  • Nonslip silicone base.
  • Minimalist design that’s full of function.
Brand
Herman Miller
Collection
Formwork Collection
General Dimensions
  • 2" H 6⅜" W 5⅛" D
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Korbo Handmade Wire Basket
description:
Handwoven from a single strand of wire, the Korbo Handmade Wire Basket (1922) holds everything from laundry to tools. The bin (18 liters) has a handle for wall hanging, and the classic baskets (35 and 80 liters) come with two opposing handles. Choose brass wire that will gradually develop a rich patina or acid-proof stainless steel wire that won’t rust or lose its luster with age. Made in Sweden.
  • Sturdy storage baskets and bins.
  • Handcrafted from brass or stainless steel wire.
  • Versatile enough to be used throughout the home.
Brand
Korbo
General Dimensions
  • 14" H 11⅞" DIA
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Trove Box
description:
Trove Desktop Storage (2017) brings rhythm and order to the items that populate our desks, from stationery to random odds and ends. This modular stacking system is fashioned from cork for a warm and tactile finish, with minimal components that seamlessly slot and stack together. Configure it as you see fit to help eliminate clutter in your workspace. Made in China.

Case

title: DWR Aerocotton Towel
description:
The DWR Aerocotton Towel (2011) is crafted from pure Turkish cotton using an innovative spinning process that creates wonderfully soft material with ample surface area for the yarns, translating into superb absorbency. It’s woven into a nice 700-gram weight, then combed more softness. In keeping with a simple modern aesthetic, it eschews the traditional dobby and has a sewn-in tag that doubles as a hanger. Even after repeated washings, this towel remains fluffy and soft. Set of three includes a washcloth, hand towel, and bath towel. Machine washable. Made in Turkey.
  • 100% Turkish cotton.
  • Soft and super absorbent.
  • Remains fluffy and soft even after repeated washings.
  • Made with an innovative spinning process that creates wonderfully plush, ultra-soft material.
Brand
Design Within Reach
General Dimensions
  • 20" H 30" W 24" D

title: Cotton Bathmat
description:
After studying textile design in Milan and the nuances of weaving in India, Olivia Smith returned to her native New Zealand and founded Nodi, which specializes in natural handmade rugs. The Nodi Cotton Bathmat (2017), like all pieces from her company, is made on a traditional wooden loom by skilled artisans in a GoodWeave factory, ensuring child labor is never used. It’s neutral in color with short fringes on the sides and long fringes on the ends. Machine washable on cold only. Made in India.
  • Handmade cotton bathmat in neutral tones.
  • Produced in a GoodWeave factory, ensuring no child labor.
  • Machine washable on cold only.
Brand
Nodi
General Dimensions
  • 24" H 36" W
Product Weight
1 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled

title: Brodie Wall Hook
description:
Made from ultra-durable HDPE (high density polyethylene) partially derived from recycled single-use plastics like milk jugs and shampoo bottles, Brodie is a durable wall storage solution for your entryway, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, garage … wherever you need a convenient way to store the things you wear and use. Mounting hardware included. Made in U.S.A.
  • Sold as a single wall hook.
  • Made of plastic partially derived from recycled single-use plastics like milk jugs.
  • Will not rot or splinter.
  • Never needs to be painted or stained.
  • Mounting hardware included.
All Loll outdoor furniture is made with recycled high-density polyethylene (HDPE). Colored material is post-consumer recycled HDPE sourced mainly from single-use milk jugs, while black material is post-industrial recycled HDPE. More than 95 percent of the waste from Loll's manufacturing process is sent to a local recycling plant where it is recycled again. From the HDPE plastic to the aluminum inserts and stainless steel fasteners, Loll furniture is all recyclable.
Brand
Loll Designs
General Dimensions
  • 3" H 1" W 3" DIA
Product Weight
0.25 lbs
Assembly
Requires Assembly
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Colour Frame Mirror
description:
Swiss-French designer Julie Richoz’s Colour Frame Mirror for Vitra (2024) has the graphic appeal of children’s wood toys. Available in three sizes and color combinations, this cheery mirror has a sizable shelf for storing small household items. Arrange several mirrors together — like building blocks — to create unique compositions. Made in Germany.
  • Small-space friendly.
  • Can be hung horizontally or vertically.
  • Wall mounting recommended.
Brand
Vitra
General Dimensions
  • 55¼" H 23" W 3" D
Product Weight
42 lbs

Comes fully assembled
